articles.image_title: Hungry people looting supermarkets at Iskenderun in Hatay region, south of Turkey on February 7, 2023. Dozens of powerful aftershocks continued to jolt southern Turkey and northern Syria on Tuesday, a day after an earthquake struck the region killing more than 5,000 people and destroying thousands of buildings, as difficult conditions, freezing temperatures and damaged roads hampered rescue efforts. Photo by Efekan Akyuz/Depo Photos/ABACAPRESS.COM

articles.title: Deutschland
articles.image_title: Firefighters of a local fire department clean the platform at the train station in Brokstedt, northern Germany, after two people were killed and several others wounded in a knife attack on a regional train between the cities of Hamburg and Kiel. - Police announced that the alleged assailant had been captured. The suspect was taken into custody at the railway station in the town of Brokstedt. It was not immediately clear how many people had been injured or how serious their condition was. Media reports cited around five wounded. (Photo by Gregor Fischer / AFP)
